Frame.Title: Peanuts
Frame.SpeechBubble: PEOPLE COME AND PEOPLE GO, BUT THE EARTH KEEPS ON SPINNING..
SPINNING THROUGH SPACE...THE EARTH KEEPS ON SPINNING THROUGH SPACE
OH, MY, CHARLIE BROWN! YOU MAY NOT BE THE BRIGHTEST PERSON IN THE WORLD, BUT YOU SURE HAVE SOME IMAGINATION!
